Directions: Shake before use. After cleansing, spray onto your face and neck until your skin is moist (holding bot
book: 2152-Happy Skin Care Tickled Pink Perfecting Tonic (2020 formulation)

chunk: s moist (holding bottle 10-15cm from face). The Tickled Pink can be left on or washed off. It's also an excellent aftershave (but you may not want to share this info with your husband!). You can use the Tickled Pink Perfecting Tonic for a double cleanse too. This means that you cleanse first with the Cloud 9 Deep Cleansing Balm or 3 Cheers Cleansin
book: 2152-Happy Skin Care Tickled Pink Perfecting Tonic (2020 formulation)

chunk:
or 3 Cheers Cleansing Oil, then spray on your Tickled Pink and wipe it off with a cotton makeup pad. You can then choose to give your skin another spray if you like which you don't wipe off.
